Convert an anndata object to a seurat object using reticulate

Source: R/DataConvert.R
adata_to_srt.Rd

Convert an anndata object to a seurat object using reticulate

Usage

adata_to_srt(adata, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

adata

A connected python anndata object.

verbose

Whether to print messages.

Examples

data(pancreas_sub)
pancreas_sub <- standard_scop(pancreas_sub)
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:14:43] Start standard scop workflow...
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:14:44] Checking a list of <Seurat> objects...

#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:14:49] Reorder clusters...
#> ! [2025-09-12 11:14:49] Using `Seurat::AggregateExpression()` to calculate pseudo-bulk data for <Assay5>
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:14:49] Perform umap nonlinear dimension reduction on the data...
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:14:49] Non-linear dimensionality reduction (umap) using (Standardpca) dims (1-50) as input
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:14:54] Non-linear dimensionality reduction (umap) using (Standardpca) dims (1-50) as input
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:14:58] Run scop standard workflow done
adata <- srt_to_adata(pancreas_sub)
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:00] Checking 2 packages in environment: scop_env
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:00] Retrieving package list for environment: scop_env
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] Found 194 packages installed
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] scanpy version: 1.11.3
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] numpy version: 1.26.4
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] Converting <Seurat> to <AnnData> ...
#> ! [2025-09-12 11:15:03] "misc" slot is not converted
#> ! [2025-09-12 11:15:03] "tools" slot is not converted
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] Convert <Seurat> object to <AnnData> object completed
adata <- RunPAGA(
  adata = adata,
  group_by = "SubCellType",
  linear_reduction = "PCA",
  nonlinear_reduction = "UMAP"
)
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] Running PAGA analysis...
#> Error in py_call_impl(callable, call_args$unnamed, call_args$named): ValueError: Did not find PCA in `.obsm.keys()`. You need to compute it first.
#> Run `reticulate::py_last_error()` for details.
srt <- adata_to_srt(adata)
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:03] Converting <AnnData> object to <Seurat> object...
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:15:04] Convert <AnnData> object to <Seurat> object completed
srt
#> An object of class Seurat 
#> 47994 features across 1000 samples within 3 assays 
#> Active assay: RNA (15998 features, 0 variable features)
#>  1 layer present: counts
#>  2 other assays present: spliced, unspliced
#>  9 dimensional reductions calculated: X_pca, X_X_pca, X_umap, X_X_umap, Standardpca, StandardpcaUMAP2D, StandardpcaUMAP3D, StandardUMAP2D, StandardUMAP3D

# Or convert a h5ad file to Seurat object
library(reticulate)
#> Error in library(reticulate): there is no package called ‘reticulate’
check_python("scanpy")
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:05] Checking 1 packages in environment: scop_env
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:06] Retrieving package list for environment: scop_env
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:08] Found 194 packages installed
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:15:08] scanpy version: 1.11.3
sc <- import("scanpy")
#> Error in import("scanpy"): could not find function "import"
adata <- sc$read_h5ad("pancreas.h5ad")
#> Error: object 'sc' not found
srt <- adata_to_srt(adata)
#> ℹ [2025-09-12 11:15:08] Converting <AnnData> object to <Seurat> object...
#> ✔ [2025-09-12 11:15:10] Convert <AnnData> object to <Seurat> object completed
srt
#> An object of class Seurat 
#> 47994 features across 1000 samples within 3 assays 
#> Active assay: RNA (15998 features, 0 variable features)
#>  1 layer present: counts
#>  2 other assays present: spliced, unspliced
#>  9 dimensional reductions calculated: X_pca, X_X_pca, X_umap, X_X_umap, Standardpca, StandardpcaUMAP2D, StandardpcaUMAP3D, StandardUMAP2D, StandardUMAP3D
